players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her."
Diana: "Charlie, your claim is serious. Alice, how do you respond to being accused of mafia?"
You: "Alice is innocent! Charlie is lying to cover up his own role. Diana, why trust Charlie so quickly without proof?"
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."

You: "Alice is being framed by Charlie, who is clearly trying to deflect suspicion. Diana, think carefully—if Charlie were really the detective, why would he risk accusing me so boldly without solid proof?"

Diana: "Charlie, your accusation is strong but uncorroborated. Alice, your denial is also suspicious. We must consider that one of you is lying. Diana suggests we vote carefully and watch reactions closely."
